QuestData.Title: A Lonely Spirit
QuestData.Description:
Da spirit of a child named Keula be wanderin' me temple grounds. Her ma'da gave her child up ta me long ago, she be thinkin' that a great sacrifice would spare her from me call, from going to da other side.
Well she be right, I not claim her yet. But she be wrong too. Her child be da one to decide when ta be reunited with her ma'da, and it seem ta me dat da child be no longer be content ta wait.
Dey both belong in my realm.
Go, bring da child to her ma'da.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Keula within the Necropolis.
